title: Initial D: Pope John XXII(?) Writing before the Man of Sorrows
description: Initial D: Pope John XXII(?) Writing before the Man of Sorrows; Atelier of the Passion Master; Northeastern (illuminated), France; text and illumination about 1330; Tempera colors, gold, and iron gall ink on parchment; Leaf: 17 × 11.9 cm (6 11/16 × 4 11/16 in.); Ms. 46, fol. 316v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
